unnormalised: Well, last week, 22/08/2024, Mumbai was crazy humid at 90% RH, felt like 35°C even though the actual temp was 30°C, and IMD is saying it'll be the same till 28/08/2024.
normalised: Well, last week, twenty second august two thousand and twenty four, Mumbai was crazy humid at ninety percent R-H, felt like thirty five degree celsius even though the actual temp was thirty degree celsius, and I-M-D is saying it will be the same till twenty eighth august two thousand and twenty four.
